groups.name: app
groups.description: Application configuration properties for APiGen Core.

groups.name: app.cache
groups.description: Cache configuration for entities, lists, and counts.

properties.name: apigen.core.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable APiGen Core auto-configuration.

properties.name: app.api.base-path
properties.description: Base path for all API endpoints.

properties.name: app.cache.entities.max-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entities to cache.

properties.name: app.cache.entities.expire-after-write
properties.description: Time after which cached entities expire.

properties.name: app.cache.lists.max-size
properties.description: Maximum number of list results to cache.

properties.name: app.cache.lists.expire-after-write
properties.description: Time after which cached lists expire.

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: List of allowed origins for CORS.

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: List of allowed HTTP methods for CORS.

properties.name: app.cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: Whether to allow credentials in CORS requests.

properties.name: app.cors.max-age
properties.description: Max age in seconds for CORS preflight cache.

properties.name: app.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable custom metrics collection.

properties.name: app.metrics.slow-threshold-ms
properties.description: Threshold in milliseconds for slow request logging.

properties.name: app.rate-limit.max-requests
properties.description: Maximum number of requests per window.

properties.name: app.rate-limit.window-seconds
properties.description: Time window in seconds for rate limiting.
